name: Caldo Verde
steps: Peel and cut potatoes into 1-inch pieces. Mince garlic and onion.
In a large pot over medium heat, cook onion and garlic in olive oil for 3 minutes.
Stir in potatoes and cook, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes more. Pour in chicken stock and 2 cups water, bring to a boil, and let boil gently for 20 minutes, until potatoes are soft.
Puree potatoes until no large chunks remain.
Add kale to soup and simmer until kale is tender and jade green, 5 minutes.
Stir in sliced chouriço and add salt and pepper to taste.
